title: Neon Aloy Shagotom
description:
A mixed album titled, Neyon Aloy Shagotom was released form the production house, G- Series. Its music is arranged by Zia, the bassist of the fusion band Shironamhin. The album features these bands: 
Bangla, 
Meghdol, 
Aajob, 
Karnishey Magpie, 
Shohortoli, 
Joler Gaan, 
Road House, 
Striking, 
Shohor, 
D'Minor, 
Biborton, 
Sorboda 
and Shironamhin. 
Project of a long term planning and arrangement, most of the album's recording is being taken at the studio Auchin and rest of the recording is being carried on at studio Jatra, Dreamdesk and STV. K M Sohel, the sound engineer of Auntor Showbiz and G M Jewel of Auchin are architecting its sound. The planning for the album including its related activities was based on opinion from the enthusiastic musicians at the web forum owned by the band Shironamhin. This was an exceptional case in regards to production of an album in our country. The organizers hope the album would be exceptional and lauded by the listeners. Particularly, each song with its lyrics would have different touch in them. It will be an inspiration for those who crave for quality music.
